nodes.text: Captain Brast'alshi'barku, also known by his core name of Talshib was a Chiss military officer of the Chiss Expansionary Defense Force who served in 22 ABY as line commander of the diplomatic ship Chaf Envoy. He wore green facings on his black uniform, whereas his superior General Drask bore red trim.
Brast'alshi'barku first appeared in the 2004 novel Survivor's Quest written by Timothy Zahn.
